 2. The authority and service provider shall provide to the state
comptroller on March thirty-first and September thirtieth of each year a
report documenting each contract in excess of two hundred fifty thousand
dollars per year entered into with a third party and related to
management and operation services associated with the authority's
electric transmission and distribution system, including the name of the
third party, the contract term and a description of services or goods to
be procured, and post such report on each of their websites. All
contracts entered into between the service provider and third parties
are not subject to the requirements of subdivision one of this section.
